## createThirdwebSDK() function

Create an SDK instance using the local configuration generated by the Solana CLI

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function createThirdwebSDK(
  network: Network,
  storage?: ThirdwebStorage,
): ThirdwebSDK;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                           | Description       |
| --------- | ------------------------------ | ----------------- |
| network   | [Network](./solana.network.md) |                   |
| storage   | ThirdwebStorage                | <i>(Optional)</i> |

**Returns:**

[ThirdwebSDK](./solana.thirdwebsdk.md)

## Example

```jsx
import { createThirdwebSDK } from "@thirdweb-dev/solana";

// Select the network to create the SDK on
const sdk = createThirdwebSDK("devnet");
```
